titleStmt.title: The tryal and condemnation of Dr. Oliver Plunket, titular primate of Ireland, for high-treason at the barr of the Court of King's Bench at Westminster, in Trinity term, 1681.
titleStmt.author: Plunket, Oliver, Saint, 1629-1681.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Joseph Ray for Eliphal Dobson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
